description.compact: A wrapper for a web page.

docblock.description: @package SimpleTest @subpackage WebTester

description.compact: Parses a page ready to access it's contents.

docblock.description: @param SimpleHttpResponse $response Result of HTTP fetch. @access public

description.compact: Extracts all of the response information.

docblock.description: @param SimpleHttpResponse $response Response being parsed. @access private

description.compact: Sets up a missing response.

docblock.description: @access private

description.compact: Original request as bytes sent down the wire.

docblock.description: @return mixed Sent content. @access public

description.compact: Accessor for raw text of page.

docblock.description: @return string Raw unparsed content. @access public

description.compact: Accessor for plain text of page as a text browser would see it.

docblock.description: @return string Plain text of page. @access public

description.compact: Accessor for raw headers of page.

docblock.description: @return string Header block as text. @access public

description.compact: Original request method.

docblock.description: @return string GET, POST or HEAD. @access public

description.compact: Original resource name.

docblock.description: @return SimpleUrl Current url. @access public

description.compact: Base URL if set via BASE tag page url otherwise @return SimpleUrl Base url.

docblock.description: @access public

description.compact: Original request data.

docblock.description: @return mixed Sent content. @access public

description.compact: Accessor for last error.

docblock.description: @return string Error from last response. @access public

description.compact: Accessor for current MIME type.

docblock.description: @return string MIME type as string; e.g. 'text/html' @access public

description.compact: Accessor for HTTP response code.

docblock.description: @return integer HTTP response code received. @access public

description.compact: Accessor for last Authentication type. Only valid straight after a challenge (401).

docblock.description: @return string Description of challenge type. @access public

description.compact: Accessor for last Authentication realm. Only valid straight after a challenge (401).

docblock.description: @return string Name of security realm. @access public

description.compact: Accessor for current frame focus. Will be false as no frames.

docblock.description: @return array Always empty. @access public

description.compact: Sets the focus by index. The integer index starts from 1.
Sets the focus by name. Always fails for a leaf page.
Clears the frame focus. Does nothing for a leaf page.

docblock.description: @access public

description.compact: Adds a tag to the page.

docblock.description: @param SimpleTag $tag Tag to accept. @access public

description.compact: Opens a label for a described widget.

docblock.description: @param SimpleFormTag $tag Tag to accept. @access public

description.compact: Closes the most recently opened label.

docblock.description: @access public

description.compact: Tests to see if a tag is a possible form element.
Opens a form. New widgets go here.

docblock.description: @param SimpleFormTag $tag Tag to accept. @access public

description.compact: Closes the most recently opened form.

docblock.description: @access public

description.compact: Opens a frameset. A frameset may contain nested frameset tags.

docblock.description: @param SimpleFramesetTag $tag Tag to accept. @access public

description.compact: Closes the most recently opened frameset.

docblock.description: @access public

description.compact: Takes a single frame tag and stashes it in the current frame set.

docblock.description: @param SimpleFrameTag $tag Tag to accept. @access public

description.compact: Test to see if in the middle of reading a frameset.

docblock.description: @return boolean True if inframeset. @access private

description.compact: Test to see if link is an absolute one.
Adds a link to the page.

docblock.description: @param SimpleAnchorTag $tag Link to accept. @access protected

description.compact: Marker for end of complete page. Any work in progress can now be closed.

docblock.description: @access public

description.compact: Test for the presence of a frameset.

docblock.description: @return boolean True if frameset. @access public

description.compact: Accessor for frame name and source URL for every frame that will need to be loaded. Immediate children only.
Fetches a list of loaded frames.

docblock.description: @return array/string Just the URL for a single page. @access public

description.compact: Accessor for a list of all links.
Accessor for URLs by the link label. Label will match regardess of whitespace issues and case.
Accessor for a URL by the id attribute.
Converts a link tag into a target URL.
Expands expandomatic URLs into fully qualified URLs.
Sets the base url for the page.

docblock.description: @param SimpleTag $tag Base URL for page. @access protected

description.compact: Sets the title tag contents.

docblock.description: @param SimpleTitleTag $tag Title of page. @access protected

description.compact: Accessor for parsed title.

docblock.description: @return string Title or false if no title is present. @access public

description.compact: Finds a held form by button label. Will only search correctly built forms.
Finds a held form by image using a selector.
Finds a held form by the form ID. A way of identifying a specific form when we have control of the HTML code.
Sets a field on each form in which the field is available.
Accessor for a form element value within a page.
